Text: Since you seem to have such a large collection of Living Dead books, I was wondering if you either of the Living Dead: London books.

@oskar5000

I definately don't have the london series. Most of what I have are from 2000 and onward, but I'll try to look for it though. It's very old so I may not be able to find it. I am uploading the Plague of the Living Dead series soon though!

@osker5000

I will be uploading "The Dead - Kingdom of Flies" comic which does take place somewhere in London, or the UK in general but I'll still keep an eye out for the Living Dead London series!
Thanks, Robbie, I should have remembered it was pretty old. I read the first one years ago and never found the second!
